00036 #define FREENECT_FRAME_W 640 
00037 #define FREENECT_FRAME_H 480 
00038 #define FREENECT_FRAME_PIX (FREENECT_FRAME_H*FREENECT_FRAME_W) 
00040 #define FREENECT_IR_FRAME_W 640 
00041 #define FREENECT_IR_FRAME_H 488 
00042 #define FREENECT_IR_FRAME_PIX (FREENECT_IR_FRAME_H*FREENECT_IR_FRAME_W) 
00044 #define FREENECT_VIDEO_RGB_SIZE (FREENECT_FRAME_PIX*3) 
00045 #define FREENECT_VIDEO_BAYER_SIZE (FREENECT_FRAME_PIX) 
00046 #define FREENECT_VIDEO_YUV_RGB_SIZE (FREENECT_VIDEO_RGB_SIZE) 
00047 #define FREENECT_VIDEO_YUV_RAW_SIZE (FREENECT_FRAME_PIX*2) 
00048 #define FREENECT_VIDEO_IR_8BIT_SIZE (FREENECT_IR_FRAME_PIX)     
00049 #define FREENECT_VIDEO_IR_10BIT_SIZE (FREENECT_IR_FRAME_PIX*sizeof(uint16_t)) 
00050 #define FREENECT_VIDEO_IR_10BIT_PACKED_SIZE 390400

00057 #define FREENECT_COUNTS_PER_G 819

00075         LED_GREEN            = 1, 
00076         LED_RED              = 2, 
00077         LED_YELLOW           = 3, 
00078         LED_BLINK_GREEN      = 4, 
00079         // 5 is same as 4, LED blink Green
00080         LED_BLINK_RED_YELLOW = 6, 
00081 } freenect_led_options;

00115 // usb backend specific section
00116 #ifdef _WIN32
00117   /* frees Windows users of the burden of specifying the path to <libusb-1.0/libusb.h> */
00118   typedef void freenect_usb_context;
00119 #else
00120   #include <libusb-1.0/libusb.h>
00121   typedef libusb_context freenect_usb_context; 
00122 #endif

00126 #ifndef _WIN32

00128 #else
00129 
00130   #ifdef __cplusplus
00131     #define FREENECTAPI extern "C" __declspec(dllexport)
00132   #else
00133     // this is required when building from a Win32 port of gcc without being
00134     // forced to compile all of the library files (.c) with g++...
00135     #define FREENECTAPI __declspec(dllexport)
00136   #endif
00137 #endif
